snippet.title: Tales of Grumville: A Legendary Pie and A Nameless Statue Launch Trailer
snippet.description: Tales of Grumville: A Legendary Pie and A Nameless Statue is a gorgeous, free visual novel. "Follow Audrey as she fights boredom in her small town, comes across a mysterious statue whose name has been lost to time, and stumbles upon the greatest adventure of her life (so far)." https://mushroomallow.itch.io/tales-of-grumville #indiegames #visualnovel #freegames
